[Ugaritic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ugaritic_alphabet) [ALPHABET](ALPHABET.html)  

![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Ugaritic-alphabet-chart.svg/1104px-Ugaritic-alphabet-chart.svg.png)  

Naturally ordered as [Halaham](Halaham.html)
h l ḥ m q w  ṯ/š r b/ø t ḏ/ø š/s  k  n  ḫ ș ś p/f ʾ  ʿ  ḍ   g d   ġ ṭ  z  ø/ḏ y
h l ḥ m ø w  ṯ   r b   t  ḏ   š   k  n  ẖ č ś  p  ỉ  ʿ  ḍ   g d   ġ ṭ  z      y
𐎅	𐎍	𐎃	𐎎	𐎖	𐎆 𐎘  𐎗 (𐎁)𐎚 	𐎛 𐎌   𐎋 𐎐	𐎇	𐎒	𐎕	 𐎔 	𐎀 𐎓 	𐎑	𐎂	𐎄	𐎂	𐎉 𐎑     𐎊
𐩠 𐩡 𐩢 𐩣 𐩤 𐩥  𐩻   𐩧   𐩨  𐩩  𐩹  𐩦    𐩫  𐩬  𐩭 𐩮 𐩮  𐩰  𐩱 𐩲   𐩳   𐩴 𐩵   𐩶 𐩷  𐩸 𐩹 𐩺 𐩼 ?
